context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"6a7281","name":"ARIA state or property has valid value","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that each ARIA state or property has a valid value.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"aria11:state_prop_values":{"title":"ARIA 1.1, 6.3 Values for States and Properties","forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"satisfied","inapplicable":"satisfied"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Anne Thyme Nørregaard"]}
